mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id,t1.name,t1.tch_id,t1.nick_name,t1.time,t1.room,t1.class_id,t2.*,t3.name as class_name FROM mxg_course t1 LEFT JOIN mxg_business_status t2 ON t1.id = t2.business_key LEFT JOIN mxg_class t3 ON t1.class_id = t3.id WHERE t1.tch_id = #{req.username}
AND t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.course}, '%')
AND t1.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.teacher}, '%')
ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC

SELECT * from mxg_elective_course t1 where 1=1
AND t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.course}, '%')
AND t1.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.teacher}, '%')

SELECT t1.id,t1.name,t1.tch_id,t1.nick_name,t1.time,t1.room,t1.class_id,t2.*,t3.name as class_name FROM mxg_course t1 LEFT JOIN mxg_business_status t2 ON t1.id = t2.business_key LEFT JOIN mxg_class t3 ON t1.class_id = t3.id WHERE t1.id = #{id} ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mxg_student_elective_course (id, name, nick_name,student_id) SELECT #{id}, #{username}, (SELECT nick_name FROM mxg_student WHERE name = #{username}),(SELECT student_id FROM mxg_student WHERE name = #{username})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mxg_student_elective_course WHERE id = #{id} AND name = #{username}
